Title: Silverlight Gif Animation Control
HomeWiki:
GIF Animation Control for Silverlight

Project Description

Gif Control for Silverlight is a library, which provides functionality for loading and animate from gif format.

At the moment the library is able to load the gif format. Please have a look at the sample demo and select a image which should be displayed.

I would very happy for a comment with the image attached, which you used for testing.


 

Howto's
